H0.text: Which cricketer holds the record of taking the most wickets in Test Matches for England. James Anderson

H1.text: Which cricketer holds the record of taking the most wickets in Test Matches for England. Stuart Broad

H2.text: Which cricketer holds the record of taking the most wickets in Test Matches for England. Bob Willis

H3.text: Which cricketer holds the record of taking the most wickets in Test Matches for England. IAN BOTHAM

A4.text: he is England's record Test wicket-taker.

A5.text: he holds the record for the most wickets taken by a fast bowler in Test cricket (704)
